content: I'm really looking forward to trying out the Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey ride and the Flight of the Hippogriff roller coaster. I've also heard great things about the Wand Choosing Ceremony, so I'll definitely check that out. Since I'm planning to visit at least once a month, I'll make sure to explore different parts of the park each time. Can you tell me more about the Studio Tour and what I can expect from it?
